name: Valley National Bancorp
description: Valley National Bancorp is a regional bank holding company that provides a diverse range of financial services through its subsidiary, Valley National Bank. Established in 1927, the company has grown to become a significant player in the banking sector, with a strong focus on customer service and community engagement. Headquartered in Wayne, New Jersey, Valley National Bancorp operates over 200 branch locations across New Jersey, New York, Florida, and Alabama. The bank offers a comprehensive suite of products including personal banking, commercial banking, and wealth management services. Valley National is committed to fostering financial literacy and supporting local communities through various philanthropic initiatives. The company has also embraced digital banking solutions, ensuring that clients have access to modern banking conveniences. With a robust capital base and a strategic focus on growth, Valley National Bancorp is well-positioned to continue expanding its footprint and enhancing its service offerings.

seo.meta_title: Valley National Bancorp | Comprehensive Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Valley National Bancorp, a leading regional bank providing personal, commercial, and wealth management services. Learn about our commitment to community and innovation.

faq.question: What services does Valley National Bank offer?
faq.answer: Valley National Bank offers personal banking, commercial banking, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Where is Valley National Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Valley National Bancorp is headquartered in Wayne, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Valley National Bancorp?
faq.answer: Ira Robbins is the CEO of Valley National Bancorp.

faq.question: When was Valley National Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Valley National Bancorp was founded in 1927.
